page.title: 11Help The Aged/Leics.
page.content: {Kate Geary}is a youth organiser for {"Help the Aged."}She has been doing this job for about a year and she enjoys it very much.She is gradually acquiring a good Knowledge of the community and visits many schools in the area where she talks to children ranging in age from 4-18.As well as educational programmes she encourages the children to join in fund-raising events and competitions. Everywhere she goes she takes with her Hector who is her mascot.She uses her car as her office and travels many miles every day.She makes up most of her own display material.Every term she expects to visit between 30 to 40 different schools.Secondary schools who want to give practical help to old people get in touch with Kate and she tells them where help is needed. {(By Parklands School.)
